    • Uses of CmtCommitValue in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme that implement CmtCommitValue 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CmtBigIntegerCommitValue
      Concrete implementation of CommitValue where the committed value is a BigInteger.
      class  CmtByteArrayCommitValue
      Concrete implementation of CommitValue where the committed value is a byte[].
      class  CmtGroupElementCommitValue
      Concrete implementation of CommitValue where the committed value is a GroupElement.
      Methods in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme that return CmtCommitValue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CmtCommitValue CmtCommitter.generateCommitValue(byte[] x)
      This function wraps the raw data x with a suitable CommitValue instance according to the actual implementaion.
      CmtCommitValue CmtCommitmentPhaseValues.getX()
      Returns the committed value.
      CmtCommitValue CmtReceiver.receiveDecommitment(long id)
      This function is the heart of the decommitment phase from the Receiver's point of view.
      CmtCommitValue CmtCommitter.sampleRandomCommitValue()
      This function samples random commit value to commit on.
      CmtCommitValue CmtWithProofsReceiver.verifyCommittedValue(long id)
      Verifies that the committed value with the given id was x.
      CmtCommitValue CmtReceiver.verifyDecommitment(CmtCCommitmentMsg commitmentMsg, CmtCDecommitmentMessage decommitmentMsg)
      Verifies the given decommitment object according to the given commitment object.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      This function is the heart of the commitment phase from the Committer's point of view.

      This function converts the given commit value to a byte array.

    • Uses of CmtCommitValue in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.simpleHash

      Methods in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.simpleHash that return CmtCommitValue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CmtCommitValue CmtSimpleHashCommitter.generateCommitValue(byte[] x) 
      CmtCommitValue CmtSimpleHashCommitmentValues.getX() 
      CmtCommitValue CmtSimpleHashReceiver.receiveDecommitment(long id)
      Run the decommit phase of the protocol: "WAIT for (r, x) from C IF NOT c = H(r,x), AND x <- {0, 1}^t OUTPUT REJ ELSE OUTPUT ACC and value x".
      CmtCommitValue CmtSimpleHashCommitter.sampleRandomCommitValue()
      This function samples random commit value and returns it.
      CmtCommitValue CmtSimpleHashReceiver.verifyDecommitment(CmtCCommitmentMsg commitmentMsg, CmtCDecommitmentMessage decommitmentMsg) 
      Methods in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.simpleHash with parameters of type CmtCommitValue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CmtSimpleHashCommitter.commit(CmtCommitValue input, long id)
      Runs the commit phase of the commitment scheme: "SAMPLE a random value r <- {0, 1}^n COMPUTE c = H(r,x) (c concatenated with r) SEND c to R".
      byte[] CmtSimpleHashReceiver.generateBytesFromCommitValue(CmtCommitValue value)
      This function converts the given commit value to a byte array.
      byte[] CmtSimpleHashCommitter.generateBytesFromCommitValue(CmtCommitValue value)
      This function converts the given commit value to a byte array.
      CmtCCommitmentMsg CmtSimpleHashCommitter.generateCommitmentMsg(CmtCommitValue input, long id)
      Runs the following lines of the commitment scheme: "SAMPLE a random value r <- {0, 1}^n COMPUTE c = H(r,x) (c concatenated with r)".
